description: Monitor for processes spawned after opening a suspicious file. Common applications that might be exploited are Microsoft Word, PDF readers, or compression utilities. Analytic 1 - Processes created from malicious files. (sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4688) OR (sourcetype=Sysmon EventCode=1) | search process_name IN ("WINWORD.EXE", "EXCEL.EXE", "PDFReader.exe", "7z.exe", "powershell.exe", "cmd.exe") | stats count by process_name parent_process_name command_line user | where parent_process_name IN ("explorer.exe", "outlook.exe", "thunderbird.exe")
